headline.print_headline: Russia's PM Says Government Has Funds to Honour Social Spending Pledges
headline.main: Russia's PM Says Government Has Funds to Honour Social Spending Pledges

lead_paragraph: Russia's government has enough resources honour all its social spending pledges although this will not be easy, Prime Minister Dmitry Medvedev was quoted as telling the country's president on Saturday as tensions over Crimea add to Moscow's economic ills.
